The nightmare and up to three willing creatures within 5 feet of it magically enter the Ethereal Plane from the
Material Plane, or vice versa.
Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 7
(2d6) fire damage.

The nightmare can grant resistance to fire damage to anyone riding it.
The nightmare sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

languages: understands Abyssal, Common, and Infernal but can't speak
name: Nightmare
